Text: PlansAttached is a current summary of the plans for each region as they stand right now Mr Presto had me add an extra manager to each group so that should be the only changeunless one was submitted by you Please call if you have any questions Thanks Trey Hardy

Planssmith PST Attached is a current summary of the plans for each region as they stand right now Mr Presto had me add an extra manager to each group so that should be the only changeunless one was submitted by you Please call if you have any questions Thanks Trey Hardy

Re ECT Legal Consolidation Financials Cc I was looking at last years data I noticed that the due date on last years NYMEX financials was the end of June Did the due date get moved back to July Please let me know as soon as possible Thanks Trey Hardy Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones AM To Trey ct cc Subject Re ECT Legal Consolidation Financials I am still the person who does the NYMEX filings They are due the end of July so we should probably target them to be done a little earlier since we always seem to need more time

Re ECT Legal Consolidation FinancialsFrom Tana Jones on PM To Trey ct cc Subject Re ECT Legal Consolidation Financials The date our annual exemption expires in approval letter the NYMEX sends us when they approve our exemptions Because we have so many commodities we are applying for now and the form is quite lengthy it took the NYMEX quite a while last year to approve our requests which moved the date back to July last year our renewals were due the st week of July So weve got a lttle more time to work on it I will probably start notifying the various groups that provide information for the exemptions request sometime around the middle or toward the end of May Trey Hardy PM To Tana CT cc Darin NRON Subject Re ECT Legal Consolidation Financials When I was looking at last years data I noticed that the due date on last years NYMEX financials was the end of June Did the due date get moved back to July Please let me know as soon as possible Thanks Trey Hardy Enron North America Corp From Tana Jones AM To Trey ct cc Subject Re ECT Legal Consolidation Financials I am still the person who does the NYMEX filings They are due the end of July so we should probably target them to be done a little earlier since we always seem to need more time

ECT Legal Consolidation Financials Cc Last year Edie Leschber prepared the Legal Consolidation Financial Statements and Footnotes for submission to NYMEX This year I will be doing that job If you are still handling this I would like to find out the due date If you are not will you please direct me to the appropriate individual Thanks Trey Hardy

FW Earnings roll from Cc Mrs Kitchen Attached are the margin numbers you requested The source documents are referenced below Thanks Trey Hardy Original Message From Hardy Trey Sent Sunday November PM To Killen Faith Subject Earnings roll from The numbers from to are from the DPR the remaining numbers are from the Management Summary Thanks Trey

Logistics HeadcountPST Per our phone conversation I have verified that David Baumbach and Michael Olsen are included in the Energy Operations headcount Laura is reserving a conference room on February th for our plan meeting Thanks Trey Hardy

FW Louis Dreyfus Corporation Credit Reservea follow up to my voice mail I wanted to forward this to you as well Thanks Trey Original Message From Williams Jason R Sent Wednesday May AM To Hardy Trey Cc Buy Rick Bradford William S Rohauer Tanya Quigley Dutch Dawson Sherry Subject Louis Dreyfus Corporation Credit Reserve Please note the following addition to the ENA credit reserve Counterparty Louis Dreyfus Corporation Deal Number V Originator Dutch Quigley Date April Amount The reserve covers a NYMEX swap transaction where Enron bought fixed price MMBTU The deal begins in January and runs through December with a volume of contractsmonth Please call me if you have any questions Jay Williams Ext

Cash Outlays Cc Due to the events of the past few days we are trying to determine what if any significant cash outlays will be occurring for the remainder of the year If there are any pending deals that require significant cash can you please let me know the deal name and estimated amount of cash outflow Thanks Trey Hardy
